The Mac & Chicharon is so good. So comforting. And so much better delivered to your home. I cannot in good faith recommend the ceviche but my ceviche standards are very high. Those are the only two things I have ever eaten from Coppelia.

This place is right across my in laws building. Passed it so many times and curious about the food. So glad we stopped in!  I ordered the chicken la plancha. Sooooo delicious!  Not sure how they make their quinoa but it is so flavorful! Perfect match with the marinated grilled chicken breast and spicy kale. It was so good. I am craving it again the next day. Going to order it to go and engulf it in the privacy of my own home. Will try the empanadas too!

Wonderful restaurant, thank you Yelp for leading is here.   Classic interior, friendly helpful staff and last but not least food and beverage selection were perfect.  We enjoyed every dish.  The bar was well stocked with unusual items from central and South America.   The Cuban food was wonderfully delicious. We had the Ceviche followed by the Churrasco, which was amazing. Many items to chose from, so we need to return.
Perfect place in border of Chelsea and west village yes !!! COPPELIA !!!    Churrasco is amazing!!!   But start with Mac & chicarron ,  smoky negronin is perfect ! definitely I'm coming back ...
The best arroz con pollo ever !!!! The drinks are amazing, empanadas are slammin, salmon on point ! Had almost everything on the menu . Legit one of my fav Cuban restaurants
Amazing dinner!  I had the Cuban sandwich and it was so good.  No one at our table was disappointed. Great service, great food and great drink.

Amazing Latin food! Everything that I tried was finger-lickin good. The hostess told us the wait was 15-20min and we decided to hang around in the doorway. The short ribs from the Lomo MELT in your mouth! And the Churrasco can be cooked to medium rare perfectly!  Their guacamole was honestly some of the best I've ever had in my life. The food is delicious and comes out fast. The menu is extensive, and a full kitchen at any time of the day.  They have a few veggie options that will workout for you if you're a veggie lover.

So...my boyfriend tried to order again from this restaurant and they told him that My address is pretty much blacklisted!  but wouldn't tell him why! Today he goes into the store and apparently if you wrote a bad review on here they don't deliver to you! Idk what kind of people run this establishment!! It's ridiculous! Instead of admitting they are wrong they go ahead and blacklist people! HORRIBLE!!!!!!! Get new managers!!!!  That is not how your staff should treat people!!

After a run, we stopped for a quick bite. Amazing salads! I was so impressed. I would highly recommend the food there. I customized my salad and replaced the lettuce with kale. I like how the salad has a fried egg and half an avocado. Very fresh and tasty.

This place is on point. 24 hours, seriously... and the food is good... minus the cappuccino (that needs some work). Otherwise, everything was yummy and a perfect location for after the club. Bouncer at the door to keep peace in the building.

My favorite all night diner in NYC. It has some of the best Mexican food the city has to offer. It is a God send late at night, especially In the union square area. Go here any time of day, and get a quesadilla with some guacamole and any sandwich. This place is one of the better casual diners around.

Coppelia is right in my Greenwich Village 'hood on West 14th Street right off Seventh Avenue South and is such a delight to have here with its superb, tasty meals at decent prices in an area of New York City that becomes trendier by the moment. The kitchen, the drink mixers, the wait staff are nothing short of spectacular and attentive. I've been here four times since it opened a number of years ago and never leave unsatisfied. Today I had a relatively simple meal of yellow rice and frijoles along with tostones ... out of sight! And that small cup of garlicky stuff with my tostones had me looking upward to Heaven!
What's not to like?!  24 hours, breakfast all day, huge, fantastic menu, great Cuban and Cuban-inspired food, comfy and cozy environs and vibe, friendly and easy-going staff.

A fantastic late night place to stop by after hitting up the bars. They're open super late, and the wait wasn't long at all. To be honest, we didn't order too much - just some drinks and a platter of nachos and chips & guac, but just a fun place to swing by and a different vibe than the traditional late night diner food might find around town!

Nice 24 hour restaurant. Came here around 3 AM and the place was still open and booming with customers. Had the Quesadilla 10.95 plus $4 extra with chicken. It comes with guacamole and sour cream. It was very good. The mixed rice and beans 4.75 was also good. I've passed by this place plenty of times. Glad I tried it. Will return.

As new jerseyians, Lauren and I head here every once in awhile.  This place has never let us down.  Busy but quick service, great food, Pedro our main man was funny and actually had me cracking up while taking my order.   Just our favorite diner.  To live in NJ and say this NYC diner is our favorite is saying something!

Not too impressed. I get it, not everyone can make good Cuban sandwiches! Tops vieja was gross. This is a 24 hour joint, so maybe if you are drunk and  its 2 AM you enjoy the food more. We didn't like it. Will not return!
Food was just ok but bring a parka.  We were sitting under the AC and asked them if we could move or at least turn the AC down.  They said they would but then turned it back on.
